instruction: Generate a single sentence that summarizes the following passage.
input: AI technologies are transforming the ways in which work is done. Automation of mundane tasks, streamlining of complex processes, and intelligent systems that can help employees in their daily activities are all examples of how AI is changing our workplaces.
output: AI is revolutionizing the workplace by automating mundane tasks, streamlining complex processes, and providing intelligent systems to assist employees.
